actorGained

protected void actorGained(IveObject actor)
Description copied from class: AreaGeniusImpl
Actor becomes delegated to this genius. Descendants of this class can use this method to assign the actors to different processes in the controlled area.

Overrides:
actorGained in class AreaGeniusImpl
Parameters:
actor - The actor IveObject.

actorLost

protected void actorLost(IveObject actor)
Description copied from class: AreaGeniusImpl
Actor is no more delegated to this genius. Descendants of this class can use this method to assign the actors to different processes in the controlled area.

Overrides:
actorLost in class AreaGeniusImpl
Parameters:
actor - The actor IveObject.
